name: Claustropho-Blocks
description:
--Fullscreen recommended--

Claustropho-Blocks is a game about two blocks having to work together to solve puzzles in a claustrophobic place.

Explore 3 Worlds with 5 levels each. Each world has a unique mechanic and and each level a unique solutuion. Often levels have multiple solutions making each players experience unique.

All of the games assets were created by me.

Enjoy :)
